mapper.select: SELECT d.value as "channelid", d.label as "channelname", CASE WHEN t.paychannel IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as "isusable" FROM sys_dict d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT paychannel FROM t_mis_paychannel_bank p WHERE instr(#{bankname}, p.bankname) > 0 AND p.delflag = '0' ) t ON d.value = t.paychannel WHERE d.type = 'pay_channel' AND d.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY d.sort

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_dict d JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT paychannel FROM t_mis_paychannel_bank p WHERE instr(#{bankname}, p.bankname) > 0 AND p.delflag = '0' ) t ON d.value = t.paychannel WHERE d.type = 'pay_channel' AND d.del_flag = '0'
